title: Psalm 3
subtitle: A psalm of David. When he fled from his son Absalom.

title: Psalm 4
subtitle: For the director of music. With stringed instruments. A psalm of David.

title: Psalm 5
subtitle: For the director of music. For pipes. A psalm of David.

title: Psalm 6
subtitle: For the director of music. With stringed instruments. According to *sheminith*. A psalm of David.

title: Psalm 7
subtitle: A *shiggaion* of David, which he sang to the Lord concerning Cush, a Benjaminite.

title: Psalm 8
subtitle: For the director of music. According to *gittith*. A psalm of David.

title: Psalm 54
subtitle: For the director of music. With stringed instruments. A *maskil* of David. When the Ziphites had gone to Saul and said, 'Is not David hiding among us?'

title: Psalm 67
subtitle: For the director of music. With stringed instruments. A psalm. A song.

title: Psalm 84
subtitle: For the director of music. According to *gittith*. Of the Sons of Korah. A psalm.

title: Psalm 120
subtitle: A song of ascents.

title: Psalm 121
subtitle: A song of ascents.

subtitle: A song of ascents. Of David.

subtitle: A song of ascents.
